violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.

A PLUMBING SYSTEM shall be:
(A) Repaired according to LAW; (P) and
(B) Maintained in good repair.
PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

(A) Wall and ceiling covering materials shall be attached so that they are EASILY CLEANABLE.
(B) Except in areas used only for dry storage, concrete, porous blocks, or bricks used for indoor wall construction shall be finished and SEALED to provide a SMOOTH, nonabsorbent, EASILY CLEANABLE surface.
Outer openings of a FOOD ESTABLISHMENT shall be protected against the entry of insects and rodents. Unless otherwise allowed by law.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not sealed to prevent pest entry

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.

(A) Wall and ceiling covering materials shall be attached so that they are EASILY CLEANABLE.
(B) Except in areas used only for dry storage, concrete, porous blocks, or bricks used for indoor wall construction shall be finished and SEALED to provide a SMOOTH, nonabsorbent, EASILY CLEANABLE surface.

violationsByInspectionidList.subItem: of premises for evidence of pests
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Inspections must be performed as stated above.
